org.apache.nutch.searcher

Class FetchedSegments

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.nutch.searcher.FetchedSegments
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, org.apache.hadoop.ipc.VersionedProtocol, HitContent, HitSummarizer, RPCSegmentBean, SegmentBean

    public class FetchedSegments
extends java.lang.Object
implements RPCSegmentBean
    Implements HitSummarizer and HitContent for a set of fetched segments.
